name: History Hero
description:
Made for TSA 2022 Video Game Design Competition
TSA Team ID: 2008-3 

--------OVERVIEW--------
Explore a labyrinthian pyramid and return artifacts to their place of origin. But make sure to escape before the temple shuts and traps you inside.

--------CONTROLS-------
A or < to move left
D or > to move right
W or ^ or Space to jump

--------INSPIRATION-------
During the early days of archeology and during many wars, lots of artifacts were taken from their places of origin. In the modern day, there is a movement of Repatriation, or returning artifacts and items back to their place of cultural origin.

--------OTHER-------
(If You Are Experiencing Audio Issues, Use Edge instead of Chrome)
